channel.title: [508 - Base: Palidino] Some questions
channel.description:
1. Can someone give me a kick/ban command? 2. Trade and Follow don't works. Can someone gove me any code? 3. Is there any way to change the welcome message? (Above: Welcome to RuneScape, under: Message of the Week.) 4. Ranged don't works. Any code? 5. Quest menu: can I change the text there? 6. Friend/Ignore list don't works, any code? I know, many (basic) questions, but I'm just a beginner in 508 servers, so give me any chance to learn something (I learn the most things of pieces code).
Kind Regards, Robintje1.

item.title: [508 - Base: Palidino] Some questions

item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Yeah a bit random. Just wait some one might fix it with a better ban code.

item.title: [508 - Base: Palidino] Some questions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“kemo1000, post:2, topic:306334”]KICK:

if (cmd[0].equals("kick")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = true; } }

BAN:

if (cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2.rights < 1) { if (p2 != null) { p2.banned = 1; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been banned by " + p.username); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just banned " + p2.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } else if (p2.rights >= 1) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot ban staff!"); } }[/quote]
I loled at that. Thats the exact code from my server. It wont work on his palidino base…

Robin, kemos codes wont work for you.

Read full topic

item.title: [508 - Base: Palidino] Some questions

@kemo1000 wrote:

KICK:

if (cmd[0].equals("kick")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = true; } }

BAN:

if (cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2.rights < 1) { if (p2 != null) { p2.banned = 1; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been banned by " + p.username); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just banned " + p2.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } else if (p2.rights >= 1) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot ban staff!"); } }
